Bench Press

Sets: 3

Reps: 8

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Chest

Descripton

The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest muscles. Lie on a flat bench, lift the barbell, and lower it to your chest, then push it back up.
